title: A Responsible Confession
description: WHO WAS TO MAKE RESPONSIBLE FOR DELHI GANG RAPE? Or for any other similar catastrophes against WomenThe entire write-up clusters around the pivot of responsibility of such atrocities, whether or not anybody or any authority is to make liable for having involved in the formation of such a predicament of sexual assaults against women by his act or omissions. This book reveals the true story of responsibility of that rape, and also reflects the paradox of conflicting basic human instinct with moral social responsibilities.
author: Pratap Divyesh
